LanguageData.NullObjective.title: Impossible
LanguageData.FreeSpace.title: FREE SPACE
LanguageData.FreeSpace.details: This space is automatically given to you at the start.
LanguageData.TraitRecruitBase.title: Recruit a {0} pawn
LanguageData.TraitRecruitBase.details: Recruit someone to your colony who has the trait '{0}'.
LanguageData.ColonistCountBase.title: Have {0} colonists
LanguageData.ColonistCountBase.details: At any point, reach a colonist count of {0}. Quests lodgers (desperate refugees, ect...) do not count.
LanguageData.HarvestAnimal.title: Harvest {0} {1} from ranching.
LanguageData.HarvestAnimal.details: Harvest a total of {0} {1} from ranching animals.
LanguageData.MiningBase.title: Mine {0} {1}
LanguageData.MiningBase.details: Mine and/or deep-drill a total of {0} {1}.
LanguageData.PlantYieldProgressionBase.title: Harvest {0} {1}
LanguageData.CraftBase.title: Produce {0} {1}{2}{3}
LanguageData.ProduceFoodBase.title: Cook {0} {3}
LanguageData.QuestProgressionBase.title: Complete {0} quests
LanguageData.ShipToTheStarArrival.title: Reach the location of the starship
LanguageData.ShipToTheStarArrival.details: Send a colonist to Charlon Whitestone's ship located on the world map.
LanguageData.RaidFactionBase.title: Destroy a {0} faction's settlement
LanguageData.RaidFactionBase.details: Raid and destroy a settlement of a faction with a tech level of {0}. For references: Neolithic = Tribal, Industrial = Outlanders, Spacer = Pirates, Ultra = Empire.
LanguageData.ResearchBase.title: Research {0}
LanguageData.ResearchProgressionBase.title: Research {0} projects
LanguageData.SkillLevelBase.title: Have a level {1} {0} colonist
LanguageData.SkillLevelBase.details: Have a colonist with a {0} skill of {1}.
LanguageData.VisitBiomesBase.title: Visit {0} different biomes
LanguageData.MentalBreakBase.title: Experience {0} {1}mental breaks.
LanguageData.MentalBreakBase.details: Have your colonists - intentionally or not - experience {0} {1}mental breaks. They can be the same mental break type, but they must be their own instance of mental break.
LanguageData.GainInspirationBase.title: Have {0} inspirations
LanguageData.GainInspirationBase.details: Have people in your colony experience {0} different instances of inspiration.
LanguageData.KillHumanoidBase.title: Kill {0} humans
LanguageData.SellGoodsBase.title: Sell {0} silvers worth of goods
LanguageData.SellGoodsBase.details: Sell and receive {0} silvers worth of goods.
LanguageData.GetRoyalTitleBase.title: Gain the {0} title
LanguageData.GetRoyalTitleBase.details: Have someone in your colony receive the title of {0}.
LanguageData.ApplyTechprintsBase.title: Apply {0} techprint(s)
LanguageData.SpendBioferriteBase.title: Spend {0} Bioferrite on Psychic Rituals
LanguageData.SpendBioferriteBase.details: Spend a total of {0} Bioferrite on conducting Psychic Rituals.
LanguageData.ImplantXenogermComplexityBase.title: Implant a xenogerm with {0} complexity
LanguageData.ImplantXenogermComplexityBase.details: Implant a xenogerm with a complexity of {0} on anyone.
LanguageData.DumpWastepackBase.title: Dump {0} wastepacks
LanguageData.DumpWastepackBase.details: Dump {0} wastepacks on any tile on the world map. You may caravan, use drop pods, or abandon tiles containing wastepacks.
LanguageData.FishingBase.title: Fish {0} fish
LanguageData.FishingBase.details: Fish {0} fish. Animals fishing does count (even wild one!).
